caption.p: Effect of LCO on migration of cancer cells. Wound-healing assay for DA3 cells treated with 46 μg/mL LCO or DMSO for control. Migration rate of cells was monitored with an optical microscope equipped with a digital camera. ( a) Photographs of the wounds captured at the indicated time points. ( b) Quantification of the percentage of wound closure was estimated by ImageJ software analysis. Data are presented as the mean ± SD of three independent experiments. Asterisks indicate statistically significant differences (* p < 0.05, ** p < 0.005, Student’s t-test).
